# Test SSE/live reload functionality

# Start server with live reload
md2html -input live.md -http :9003 &
sleep 1s

# Test raw markdown endpoint
exec curl -s http://localhost:9003/raw
stdout '# Live Reload Test'

# Test that SSE endpoint exists and responds
exec curl -s -I http://localhost:9003/events | head -1
stdout 'HTTP/1.1 200'

# Clean up background process
wait

-- live.md --
# Live Reload Test

This file tests the live reload functionality.

When this file changes, connected clients should be notified via SSE.
